jd: From: Amy Jones, BLACKAPPLE SOLUTIONS amyj@blackapple-solutions.com Reply to: amyj@blackapple-solutions.com Role : Java-Microservices developerTechnical Skills:Java developer requires skills -‎‎ Backend Technologies (Java 8, Java 11, microservices, spring boot, Rest API's) – Must have All .‎ Frameworks (NodeJS or ExpressJS, Django) - Must haves one of them.‎ Database Management Systems (MySQL, SQL SERVER and PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Oracle Database).‎ Version Control, and Web Hosting Platforms (Kubernetes), - M ust have Kunbernates.‎ Devops CI/CD, Jenkins, Terraform, Docker. - Optional‎ ORM Tools(JPA, Hibernate) - must have.‎ AWS, Cloud Services (EC2, EKS, S3 Bucket, IAM) – Must have AWS, Optional AWS certification‎ Agile Scrum exposure – M ust have.‎ Module lead experience preferred (not mandatory)– must be in a position to work independently.‎ Is well versed with software development best practices.‎‎ Must have skillsets- Kafka, Terraform, OAuth, Oracle, AWS, Terraform, Aurora PostgresSQL, Kafka, MSK, SQS, Distributed Systems.‎‎ Application Technology - Java, Rest, Spring, Kafka, Data Lake, Data Mesh, AWS, Terraform.‎‎ Candidate should have Good Appetite to learn & Communication should be good.‎ At least 50% needs to have hands-on experience with AWS environments.Process Skills: Design, Development, Testing, ImplementationBehavioral Skills :Experience working with offshore / onshore modelStrong communication skills and able to work effectively in a team environment.Must have strong knowledge in Object oriented development, version control, release management, change management
